Title: A Star Is Born
Writer: Moss Hart (screen play by), Dorothy Parker (based on the 1937 screen play by), Alan Campbell (based on the 1937 screen play by), Robert Carson (based on the 1937 screen play by), William A. Wellman (based on the 1937 story by), Robert Carson (based on the 1937 story by)
Actors: Judy Garland, James Mason, Jack Carson, Charles Bickford
Plot: Norman Maine, a movie star whose career is on the wane, meets showgirl Esther Blodgett when he drunkenly stumbles into her act one night. A friendship develops, then blossoms into romance before tensions increase as Esther's career takes off while Norman's continues to plummet.
Awards: Nominated for 6 Oscars. Another 5 wins & 5 nominations.
